message: Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase a product that I believe will be highly valuable to you.  It's something I know you've been looking for, and I'm confident it will meet your needs perfectly. I'm willing to let it go for $12,000. This price is more than fair considering the value it brings, and it allows for a comfortable profit margin for both of us.  Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss the details further.
